General.Name: Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of processed frozen seafood and provision of cold storage services in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Frozen and Packaged Food Products, Feedstuff, and Other Business. Its frozen food includes shrimp, squid, Sillago fish, octopus, and cuttle fish. The company is also involved in the production of frozen ready-to-eat foods, packaged seafoods, fishmeal, and feedstuff; production and distribution of animal feeds; and provision of marketing and management services. In addition, it offers wet pet food products, such as soups, salads, fish and meat dishes, mousse, and pate; aquaculture feed pellets; canned and pouch tuna products; and dry feed products for pets, including cats and dogs. The company offers its products under the Monchou, Monchou Balanced, and Hajiko brand names. Asian Sea Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.
General.Address: 55/2 Rama2 Road, Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand, 74000
